name: Bitter Truth Demo
description:
A short demo of a WIP game made in 2016.

Bitter Truth is a WIP otome-style visual novel in which you play as Emilia, who is known as the "perfect girl" at Littlewood High and insanely popular. Her life is complete now that Callister, the most popular guy in school and one of her best friends, has become her boyfriend. They've been going out for a while now and are living quite happily... until Emilia's childhood friend, Lily, transfers into her school. What's more, an interesting new student worker named Max just showed up at her job! With these two NEW ARRIVALS and William, her other best friend, added to the mix, life may be far less perfect than Emilia thought. romantically.

Check out our website for more info!

The team has been continuously working on the full version of Bitter Truth since June 2016 and the narrative of the game is being changed. Updates can be found on our social media facebook, tumblr or twitter.
